short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds certification level of posters in the user information area of uschess.org forum posts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Parses USCF forum pages for tournament director members and adds their tournament director level under their name. The extension also adds a link on their membership number to quickly access their profile page.
